definition: Lijiang prefecture-level city in northwest Yunnan
Lishui prefecture-level city in Zhejiang/Yeosu city in South Jeolla province, Korea, the site of World Expo 2012
bright and beautiful/(of a landscape) gorgeous/(of a color) vibrant

sentences.english: Tori Ritchie says it's great year-round, and for fish and veggies, too.
sentences.chinese: 託麗裏奇說，他是偉大的全年性，爲魚類和蔬菜，太。

sentences.english: Fuck, eat shit in Li Jing, immortality is useless.
sentences.chinese: 他媽的，於靜麗喫屎，不死也沒用。

sentences.english: Clasp a rare and radiant maiden whom the angels name Lenore.
sentences.chinese: 擁抱被天使叫作麗諾爾的少女，她美麗嬌豔。
馬麗是一個苗條的女孩。

sentences.english: Audrey hung her head when I shouted at her.
sentences.chinese: 我對奧德麗嚷嚷時她低下了頭。

sentences.english: How are you getting on with your essay , Mary?
sentences.chinese: 馬麗你的小論文寫得怎麼樣了？

sentences.english: " He reached across the table and took her hand in his own suddenly, squeezing it.
sentences.chinese: 他突然靠向餐桌捉住了麗的手，握在了自己的手中。

sentences.english: I mean Michael's already 3)given up on me and I'm scared Audrey's going to go next.
sentences.chinese: 我是說麥克離開了我，我怕接下來奧德麗也會走。

sentences.english: Then come kiss me, sweet and twenty.
I think Mary dances best in our class.
sentences.chinese: 我認爲馬麗在我們班跳得最好。

sentences.english: Customarily, I spent the weekends at my aunt Badri's.
sentences.chinese: 我還總是習慣性的在巴德麗姨媽家過週末。

sentences.english: Movana Chen's main art production tools are magazines and the shredding machine.
sentences.chinese: 陳麗雲創作的主要工具是雜誌和碎紙機。

sentences.english: Ms. Jones looked at me, and then turned back to little Ashley.
sentences.chinese: 瓊斯夫人看看我，然後轉向小阿什麗。

sentences.english: Little Ashley looked at me, her face furious.
sentences.chinese: 小阿什麗盯着我，臉上帶着怒氣。

sentences.english: So Ashley figured out that she was having sex with the Governor of New York.
sentences.chinese: 阿什麗對此很明確，她跟紐約州州長有一腿。

sentences.english: Liv is a shopping addict, she said that herself.
sentences.chinese: 麗芙是一個購物迷，她自己那麼說。
